PackageOracle.name: DA_WORK_ORDER
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_WORK_ORDER
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.25.094037000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,sequence_num IN NUMBER
,create_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,earliest_possible_comp_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,technician_work_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,technician_work_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,actual_completion_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,installer_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,service_address_id IN NUMBER
,work_order_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,completion_cd IN VARCHAR2
,cancel_cd IN VARCHAR2
,comment_val IN VARCHAR2
,total_work_units_scheduled_qty IN NUMBER
,work_order_class_cd IN VARCHAR2
,bill_stop_dt IN DATE
,bill_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,sequence_num IN NUMBER
,create_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,earliest_possible_comp_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,technician_work_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,technician_work_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,actual_completion_dttm IN TIMESTAMP

,service_address_id IN NUMBER

,completion_cd IN VARCHAR2
,cancel_cd IN VARCHAR2
,comment_val IN VARCHAR2
,total_work_units_scheduled_qty IN NUMBER
,work_order_class_cd IN VARCHAR2
,bill_stop_dt IN DATE
,bill_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,work_order_id IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,sequence_num IN NUMBER
,create_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,earliest_possible_comp_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,technician_work_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,technician_work_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,actual_completion_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,installer_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,service_address_id IN NUMBER
,work_order_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,completion_cd IN VARCHAR2
,cancel_cd IN VARCHAR2
,comment_val IN VARCHAR2
,total_work_units_scheduled_qty IN NUMBER
,work_order_class_cd IN VARCHAR2
,bill_stop_dt IN DATE
,bill_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,work_order_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_work_order;

body.name: DA_WORK_ORDER
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_WORK_ORDER
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.25.108634000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,sequence_num IN NUMBER
,create_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,earliest_possible_comp_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,technician_work_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,technician_work_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,actual_completion_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,installer_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,service_address_id IN NUMBER
,work_order_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,completion_cd IN VARCHAR2
,cancel_cd IN VARCHAR2
,comment_val IN VARCHAR2
,total_work_units_scheduled_qty IN NUMBER
,work_order_class_cd IN VARCHAR2
,bill_stop_dt IN DATE
,bill_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_work_order.add(fx), parms=' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || sequence_num || '|' || create_dttm || '|' || earliest_possible_comp_dttm || '|' || technician_work_start_dttm || '|' || technician_work_end_dttm || '|' || actual_completion_dttm || '|' || installer_type_cd || '|' || service_address_id || '|' || work_order_type_cd || '|' || completion_cd || '|' || cancel_cd || '|' || comment_val || '|' || total_work_units_scheduled_qty || '|' || work_order_class_cd || '|' || bill_stop_dt || '|' || bill_start_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_work_order a
(
a.work_order_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.sequence_num
,a.create_dttm
,a.earliest_possible_comp_dttm
,a.technician_work_start_dttm
,a.technician_work_end_dttm
,a.actual_completion_dttm
,a.installer_type_cd
,a.service_address_id
,a.work_order_type_cd
,a.completion_cd
,a.cancel_cd
,a.comment_val
,a.total_work_units_scheduled_qty
,a.work_order_class_cd
,a.bill_stop_dt
,a.bill_start_dt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_work_order_id.NEXTVAL
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.sequence_num
,add.create_dttm
,add.earliest_possible_comp_dttm
,add.technician_work_start_dttm
,add.technician_work_end_dttm
,add.actual_completion_dttm
,add.installer_type_cd
,add.service_address_id
,add.work_order_type_cd
,add.completion_cd
,add.cancel_cd
,add.comment_val
,add.total_work_units_scheduled_qty
,add.work_order_class_cd
,add.bill_stop_dt
,add.bill_start_dt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.work_order_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_work_order.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,sequence_num IN NUMBER
,create_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,earliest_possible_comp_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,technician_work_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,technician_work_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,actual_completion_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,installer_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,service_address_id IN NUMBER
,work_order_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,completion_cd IN VARCHAR2
,cancel_cd IN VARCHAR2
,comment_val IN VARCHAR2
,total_work_units_scheduled_qty IN NUMBER
,work_order_class_cd IN VARCHAR2
,bill_stop_dt IN DATE
,bill_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_work_order.add, parms=' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || sequence_num || '|' || create_dttm || '|' || earliest_possible_comp_dttm || '|' || technician_work_start_dttm || '|' || technician_work_end_dttm || '|' || actual_completion_dttm || '|' || installer_type_cd || '|' || service_address_id || '|' || work_order_type_cd || '|' || completion_cd || '|' || cancel_cd || '|' || comment_val || '|' || total_work_units_scheduled_qty || '|' || work_order_class_cd || '|' || bill_stop_dt || '|' || bill_start_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_work_order a
(
a.work_order_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.sequence_num
,a.create_dttm
,a.earliest_possible_comp_dttm
,a.technician_work_start_dttm
,a.technician_work_end_dttm
,a.actual_completion_dttm
,a.installer_type_cd
,a.service_address_id
,a.work_order_type_cd
,a.completion_cd
,a.cancel_cd
,a.comment_val
,a.total_work_units_scheduled_qty
,a.work_order_class_cd
,a.bill_stop_dt
,a.bill_start_dt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_work_order_id.NEXTVAL
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.sequence_num
,add.create_dttm
,add.earliest_possible_comp_dttm
,add.technician_work_start_dttm
,add.technician_work_end_dttm
,add.actual_completion_dttm
,add.installer_type_cd
,add.service_address_id
,add.work_order_type_cd
,add.completion_cd
,add.cancel_cd
,add.comment_val
,add.total_work_units_scheduled_qty
,add.work_order_class_cd
,add.bill_stop_dt
,add.bill_start_dt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_work_order.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,work_order_id IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,sequence_num IN NUMBER
,create_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,earliest_possible_comp_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,technician_work_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,technician_work_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,actual_completion_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,installer_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,service_address_id IN NUMBER
,work_order_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,completion_cd IN VARCHAR2
,cancel_cd IN VARCHAR2
,comment_val IN VARCHAR2
,total_work_units_scheduled_qty IN NUMBER
,work_order_class_cd IN VARCHAR2
,bill_stop_dt IN DATE
,bill_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_work_order.add, parms=' || work_order_id || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || sequence_num || '|' || create_dttm || '|' || earliest_possible_comp_dttm || '|' || technician_work_start_dttm || '|' || technician_work_end_dttm || '|' || actual_completion_dttm || '|' || installer_type_cd || '|' || service_address_id || '|' || work_order_type_cd || '|' || completion_cd || '|' || cancel_cd || '|' || comment_val || '|' || total_work_units_scheduled_qty || '|' || work_order_class_cd || '|' || bill_stop_dt || '|' || bill_start_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_work_order a
(
a.work_order_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.sequence_num
,a.create_dttm
,a.earliest_possible_comp_dttm
,a.technician_work_start_dttm
,a.technician_work_end_dttm
,a.actual_completion_dttm
,a.installer_type_cd
,a.service_address_id
,a.work_order_type_cd
,a.completion_cd
,a.cancel_cd
,a.comment_val
,a.total_work_units_scheduled_qty
,a.work_order_class_cd
,a.bill_stop_dt
,a.bill_start_dt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.work_order_id
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.sequence_num
,add.create_dttm
,add.earliest_possible_comp_dttm
,add.technician_work_start_dttm
,add.technician_work_end_dttm
,add.actual_completion_dttm
,add.installer_type_cd
,add.service_address_id
,add.work_order_type_cd
,add.completion_cd
,add.cancel_cd
,add.comment_val
,add.total_work_units_scheduled_qty
,add.work_order_class_cd
,add.bill_stop_dt
,add.bill_start_dt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_work_order.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,work_order_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_work_order.del, parms=' || work_order_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_work_order a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.work_order_id = del.work_order_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_work_order.del');

END del;

END da_work_order;
